Developer Terms of Use
des:
With Glamox Heating skill and Alexa, you can now control your Glamox Heating thermostat hands free. Just tell Alexa what you want and Glamox Heating devices will do it.

When using the skill, you need to specify by name which thermostat/plug to use. Use the name you set up already – these are shown in the Glamox Heating app and can be changed in settings on each device. You can also add Glamox Heating devices to new or existing groups in the Alexa app.

Once you know the name of your thermostat/plug, you can give voice commands to Alexa.

Thermostat
After connecting Alexa to your Glamox Heating thermostat, you can say commands like:
"Alexa, set [bedroom] temperature to 24"
"Alexa, set heater to 20 degrees"
"Alexa, decrease thermostat temperature by 2 degrees"
“Alexa, what is the [thermostat name] set to?”
"Alexa, what is the temperature in the [kitchen]?"
